traits.name: Weakening Poison
traits.desc: When you hit a target with an attack, the target is Poisoned until the end of your next turn.

traits.name: Barbed Whip
traits.desc: +3 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Leader
traits.desc: One ally that can hear you can spend their reaction to make a basic attack against a target of your choice.

traits.name: Screeching Fungus Grenade
traits.desc: a 15 ft. radius sphere centered on a point within 30 ft. of you. Effect: Any creature that enters the terrain or start their turn within takes 6 thunder damage.
